analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#26-27) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#29-34)

HODLIT.registerEtherBalance (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#286-299) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.balance > 200000000000000000 && etherBalances[msg.sender] == 0 && _referral != msg.sender)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol:
	Contract HODLIT has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#277-280)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#26-27)
HODLIT.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0x24021d38db53a938446ecb0a31b1267764d9d63d.sol#224-226)
